summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Turkish e-commerce flooring website. All major functionalities working correctly including homepage, navigation, product display, cart operations, favorites, order flow, and WhatsApp integration.

design_issues.issue: No dedicated 404 error page found for invalid URLs

passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loading and hero section visibility
Add to cart and cart counter updates
Cart page quantity controls and item removal
Order form validation and field filling
localStorage persistence for cart and favorites
